name: FRAICHE 5000 DENTAL MINT
indications: fluoride dental gel intended dental caries preventive adults pediatric patients .
contraindications: twice day ( morning evening ) place regular toothpaste recommended dentist physician . adults children 6 years age older . twist cap remove foil seal . apply least 1-inch strip gel onto soft bristle toothbrush . brush teeth thoroughly least 1 minute . spit rinse mouth thoroughly .
indications_original: This is a fluoride dental gel intended for use as dental caries preventive in adults and pediatric patients.
contraindications_original: Use twice a day (morning and evening) in place of regular toothpaste or as recommended by a dentist or a physician. Adults and children 6 years of age and older. Twist off cap and remove foil seal. Apply at least a 1-inch strip of gel onto a soft bristle toothbrush.Â Brush teeth thoroughly for at least 1 minute. Spit out and rinse mouth thoroughly.
